EXAMPLE THM
HYPOTHESES: 
POINT A B C D E F G
TRIANGLE A B C
FOOT D C A B
ON_PLINE E D C B
ON_LINE E A C
ON_LINE F B C
ON_LINE G A B
EQANGLE G F B C D E
SHOW: PERPENDICULAR F G A B
A(336.000000000000000+7,236.000000000000000-24)  B(215.000000000000000+7,410.000000000000000-24)  C(451.000000000000000+7,410.000000000000000-24)  D(291.925796469042900+7,299.379433176748250-24)  E(377.888705835207130+7,299.379433176748250-24)  
F(298.000000000000000+7,410.000000000000000-24)  G(242.054411470044730+7,371.095309125720750-24)
